name: Memo Game Card
description:
Memory Game is a game of memory is skills, it is inspired by the popular game of pairs where the player requires concentration and memory.

Facts wrap in a game where memory is mistress.

 In this version for iPhone, the game is composed of 3 difficulty levels and each comes with an infinite number of levels, where images are shuffled and placed face down on the screen. The player must discover two pictures, whether these form a pair remain visible, otherwise, are again covered and remittances in their original location on the screen.

The aim is to guess all pairs as quickly as possible. Faster you will be more up your score will be.

Ver. 1.40
Updated and improved Application for iOS9 and optimized for Screens iPhone6Plus iPhone6, iPhone5, iPhone4.

Ver. 1.40.1
Updated and improved Application for iOS10 and optimized for Screens iPhone7Plus, iPhone7, iPhone6Plus, iPhone6, iPhone5.
